mapper.select: select A.product_pk, A.supplier_employee_pk, A.supplier_index, A.supplier_product_name, A.supplier_cost, A.land_day, A.pick_type, A.picker, A.picker_cellphone, A.off_day, A.send_type, A.pk, A.create_user, A.update_user, A.create_time, A.update_time, B.name AS supplier_employee_name from product_supplier A LEFT JOIN supplier_employee B ON A.supplier_employee_pk = B.pk where A.product_pk = #{product_pk,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY supplier_index
